channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Original Lord of The Rings Cast Address Potential Return To Franchise: "If Peter Says 'Jump,' I Say, 'How High?'"
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: The original Lord of the Rings trilogy cast weighs in on their potential return to Middle-earth, with a spate of new spinoffs planned.

item.title: Will Smith And Michael B. Jordan’s I Am Legend 2 Sounds Much Better Than The Original Plan For The Sequel
item.description: Akiva Goldsman's original plan for his next I Am Legend movie would have been a struggle, but the updated pitch sounds so much more exciting.

item.title: Val Kilmer's 10 Most Underrated Movies
item.description: From movies that never found enough love to films that got lost in the sands of time, Val Kilmer’s career included a lot of underrated gems.
